chunks.zh: 🎉小棉袄出生, 生殖隔离已打破
chunks.en: 🎉My little padded jacket (daughter) is born, reproductive isolation has been broken.

chunks.zh: 😂我的相亲经验贴还没写完, 现在就要全身心投入到育儿事业中了.
chunks.en: 😂 My dating experience post isn't finished yet, and now I have to devote myself wholeheartedly to the parenting business.

chunks.zh: 夫人博后出站以后一直在上海高校工作, 前几年也晋升了副教授, 我大专毕业已 13 年.
chunks.en: After my wife finished her postdoc, she has been working in a university in Shanghai and was promoted to associate professor a few years ago. I graduated from junior college 13 years ago.

chunks.zh: 但是因为夫人身体条件不好, 难以怀孕.
chunks.en: However, because my wife's physical condition is not good, it is difficult for her to get pregnant.

chunks.zh: 我们两个做了 3 年试管, 夫人打了很多针吃了很多药, 也做了好几次宫腹腔镜甚至开腹剥肌瘤手术.
chunks.en: We did IVF for 3 years. My wife had many injections, took a lot of medicine, and had several hysteroscopies and even open myomectomy.

chunks.zh: 三年试管下来一直不成我们俩心灰意冷, 就快要放弃的时候.
chunks.en: After three years of IVF without success, we were discouraged and about to give up.

chunks.zh: 去年自怀了!🤯
chunks.en: Last year, she conceived naturally!🤯

chunks.zh: 孕期也不是一帆风顺, 因为宫腔条件差, 以前试管的时候有多次生化妊娠, 大夫保险期间给安排了全程的免疫和保胎药.
chunks.en: The pregnancy was not smooth sailing. Because of the poor uterine cavity condition, there were multiple biochemical pregnancies during previous IVF attempts, so the doctor arranged for full-course immune and pregnancy-preserving drugs during the insurance period.

chunks.zh: 但 29 周和 31 周还是因为前置胎盘大出血两次住院保胎, 孕期最后两个月我们俩天天盯着胎心监护, 俩人都心力交瘁.
chunks.en: However, at 29 and 31 weeks, she was hospitalized twice for threatened abortion due to placenta previa and massive bleeding. In the last two months of pregnancy, we both stared at the fetal heart monitor every day, and we were both exhausted.

chunks.zh: 宝宝非常争气, 从第一次在试纸上看到她的影子(两道杠), 整个孕前期各项指标都是压着教科书上限走, 果然自然选择出来的发育潜力最强.
chunks.en: The baby is very competitive. From the first time we saw her shadow on the test strip (two bars), all the indicators in the entire early pregnancy were at the upper limit of the textbook. Sure enough, the development potential of natural selection is the strongest.

chunks.zh: 我们约的主刀医生是上海有名的处理高危产妇的主任医师.
chunks.en: The attending doctor we booked is a famous chief physician in Shanghai who deals with high-risk pregnant women.

chunks.zh: 剖宫产开刀的那一天, 大夫打开宫腔一看, 说这个孩子能在这个宫腔环境里存活下来简直是奇迹.
chunks.en: On the day of the cesarean section, the doctor opened the uterine cavity and said that it was a miracle that this child could survive in this uterine cavity environment.

chunks.zh:
![女鹅照]( https://i.imgur.com/kA1G1JB.jpeg)

生殖隔离真难打破
chunks.en:
![Daughter's photo]( https://i.imgur.com/kA1G1JB.jpeg)

Reproductive isolation is really hard to break.

chunks.zh: 恭喜但是提醒一下楼主 生殖隔离不是这么用的
chunks.en: Congratulations, but a reminder to the poster, reproductive isolation is not used in this way.

chunks.zh: 恭喜恭喜，但生殖隔离不能这么用，我还以为是楼主你和其它非人类物种做了啥呢？
chunks.en: Congratulations, but reproductive isolation cannot be used in this way. I thought you had done something with other non-human species?

chunks.zh: 生殖隔离指的是自嘲大专生和博士生吧= =怎么大家都没有幽默感
chunks.en: Reproductive isolation refers to the self-deprecating junior college students and doctoral students == Why doesn't everyone have a sense of humor?

chunks.zh: 夫人博后出站以后一直在上海高校工作, 前几年也晋升了副教授, 我大专毕业已 13 年学校：University of East London - BSc Computer Science你管这个叫。。。大专？
chunks.en: My wife has been working in a university in Shanghai since she finished her postdoctoral studies, and was promoted to associate professor a few years ago. I graduated from junior college 13 years ago. University: University of East London - BSc Computer Science. You call this... a junior college?

chunks.zh: 大专人说话真让人啼笑皆非，恭喜
chunks.en: What junior college people say is really ridiculous, congratulations.

chunks.zh: @None123 #9 楼主应该是自嘲自己大专妻子博后
chunks.en: @None123 #9 The poster should be mocking himself for being a junior college graduate and his wife being a postdoc.

chunks.zh: 建议改了标题，一会被喷了不高兴的就是你了
chunks.en: It is recommended to change the title, you will be unhappy if you get flamed later.

chunks.zh: 恭喜 OP从标题错乱能感受到 OP 的喜悦之情，用没用错都是小事了，母女平安是最好的
chunks.en: Congratulations OP. From the chaotic title, I can feel OP's joy. Whether it's used correctly or not is a trivial matter. Mother and daughter are safe is the best.

chunks.zh: 恭喜恭喜
chunks.en: Congratulations

chunks.en: Congratulations

chunks.zh: 恭喜
chunks.en: Congratulations

chunks.en: Congratulations!!
